children.html: Environmental destruction, absurd levels of inequality, growing cynicism and a feeling of powerlessness characterize the state of “late capitalism” we are living in today. The very possibility of collective action is asphyxiatied by the dominant globalized culture of the West, which holds an entrenched belief in the omnipotence of the individual.
